title: How To Look Guilty: A Royal Blew It, Trump Tantrums 11.20.19
itunes:title: How To Look Guilty: A Royal Blew It, Trump Tantrums 11.20.19
description:
In episode 520, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Steph Tolev to discuss food waste, impeachment updates, Trump's health, NBC shifting to the right, Joe Biden leading in the polls, a check in with State Department scammer Mina Chang, Prince Andrew's interview about Epstein and his sexual assault accusations, Epstein's guards being charged, Spotify's new Soundtrack Your Ride feature, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Meijer Aims to Reduce In-Store Food Waste with New App-Based Pilot Program
  2. Food waste is an $18.2B problem grocers are struggling to solve
  3. Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman corrects Nunes when he calls the witness "Mr. Vindman."
  4. Vindman Blows Hole In Trump’s Professed Reason For Holding Back Military Aid
  5. Vindman Puts Nunes In His Place With Reminder Of Military Rank
  6. Impeachment Hearing: Witnesses Testify on Concerns About Trump-Zelensky Call
  7. Trump’s Health: There’s a ‘Neurological Issue’ Not Being Addressed
  8. How NBC News is moving to accomodate the right
  9. Biden maintains double-digit lead, Sanders in second: poll
  10. State Department staffer resigns after allegations she inflated her resume
  11. Prince Andrew said he has a medical condition that doesn't allow him to sweat, a masterstroke against his accusers.
  12. Prince Andrew: I Didn’t Have Sex With Virginia Roberts Giuffre. I Was Eating Pizza.
  13. Prince Andrew says he has wracked his brains but cannot recall any incident involving Virginia Roberts.
  14. Bureau of Prisons Director: FBI Looking at Possible ‘Criminal Enterprise’ in Epstein’s Death
  15. Spotify takes the pain out of road trip playlists with Soundtrack Your Ride
  16. WATCH: Clarence Clarity - Cancer In The Water

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
